section.title: Typographic conventions
section.para: This book uses the following typographic conventions:
class names, method names, inline code
cursive non-proportional fonts are used if the user should replace certain code parts.

note.para: This stands for a general advice or hint.

tip.para: This stands for a tip or a suggestion.

warning.para: With this symbol, certain special behavior is explained, which could lead to problems or impose a risk.
